title: Android app deals of the day: Mars Power Industries, Rogue Hearts, Baldur’s Gate II, more
content:
Alongside big-time offers on Samsung’s new Galaxy S22/+/Ultra handsets and the Google Nest Thermostat, all of today’s best Android game and app deals are now up for the taking. Today’s collection includes title like Mars Power Industries, Rogue Hearts, Suzy Cube, Baldur’s Gate II: Enhanced Ed, Rush Rally Origins, and more. Head below the fold for a complete look at today’s best Android game and app deals. 

more…
